short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ChatGPT enhancer - adds context menu, keyboard shortcuts, history and more!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
üí¨ AI Anywhere is handy helper for ChatGPT (created by OpenAI).

‚≠ê Main features:
  - press "Alt + I" to open ChatGPT
  - customizable context menu options - Summarize / Explain / Translate {selected text}
  - click toolbar icon for instant access
  - click toolbar icon on Google to re-search with ChatGPT
  - press arrow Up / Down inside ChatGPT to access previous queries
